name: YD Network Wide NextGen
author: Yann Dubois

sections.description:
Sitewide / Network-wide Galleries and pictures

This plugin replicates all NGG galleries and images to your SWT aggregation blog.

It is an add-on to the NextGEN gallery plugin by alexrabe.
It will not work and is not useful if you do not have the NextGEN plugin installed.

Compatible with PHP5.

Revisions

  • 0.1.0. Initial beta release

Did you like it?

Drop me a line on http://www.yann.com/

And… please rate this plugin –>
sections.installation: WordPress automatic installation is fully supported and recommended.
sections.faq:
Where should I ask questions?

http://www.yann.com/en/wp-plugins/yd-network-wide-nextgen

Use comments.

I will answer only on that page so that all users can benefit from the answer.
So please come back to see the answer or subscribe to that page’s post comments.

Puis-je poser des questions et avoir des docs en français ?

Oui, l’auteur est français.
(“but alors… you are French?”)

What is your e-mail address?

It is mentioned in the comments at the top of the main plugin file. However, please prefer comments on the plugin page (as indicated above) for all non-private matters.
